scanner.cameraPermissionDescription: We just need camera access to scan barcodes. Nothing is recorded.
scanner.openSettingsMessage: Please go to Settings > Food ID > Camera and enable camera access.
scanner.enterBarcodeDescription: Enter the numbers below the barcode to find the product

product.notInDatabase: It seems this item is not in my knowledge base
product.noInformation: No information on this product yet

scores.nutriScoreDescription: Rates nutritional quality (A to E) per 100g, balancing beneficial (protein, fibre) and detrimental (fat, sugar, salt) components. A is the best choice for health.
scores.ecoscoreDescription: Rates the environmental impact (A to E), considering CO2 emissions, packaging recyclability, and ingredient origins. A is the best choice for the planet.
scores.novascoreDescription: Rates the degree of industrial processing (Group 1 to 4). Group 4 is Ultra-Processed Food (UPF), which should be limited regardless of its nutrient content.

narrative.balancedProfile: This product has a balanced nutritional profile with no significant concerns or notable benefits.
narrative.excellentConsumption: This is an excellent choice for regular consumption.
narrative.goodConsumption: This is a good choice and can be consumed regularly in moderation.
narrative.moderateConsumption: Consider consuming this product moderately and balance it with healthier options.
narrative.limitConsumption: It's best to limit consumption of this product and opt for healthier alternatives when possible.

history.emptyBasket: An empty basket tells no stories
history.startBuilding: Start building yours - one scan at a time!
history.clearAllHistoryMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all the items from your history? It won't affect to favorite products list

favourites.brokenHeartDescription: Your beloved snacks are all it needs to heal!
favourites.clearAllFavouritesMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all items from your favorites?

settings.feedbackSupportMessage: To provide feedback or request support, please e-mail {email}
settings.unableToShare: Unable to share the app. Please try again.
settings.unableToOpenStore: Unable to open the app store. Please try again.
settings.unableToOpenEmail: Unable to open email app. Please try again.

alerts.unableToShareProduct: Unable to share product. Please try again.
